summary: Global experience in operational team and process transformation resulting in significant improvement in commercial and service performance.  Creating high performing, motivated teams in diverse cultural settings.

school.name: International Fine Arts College, Miami, USA

profile_positions.description:
Atlassian provides the tools to help every team unleash their full potential.  

Manage a team of 11 people, compromised of remote teams supporting customers in the EMEA region in billing and licensing.  
Performance leadership to enhance career development, best practices, and diffuse global strategies throughout regional teams in Amsterdam and Manila.
Maintain "Legendary Service" to customers monitored through customer satisfaction scores.
Business analytics of customer feedback to identify trends and continually improve service.
Continuous improvement driven by proactive quality measures, global service standardization and innovative problem solving. 
Ensuring compliance to global policies to mitigate risk and customer dissatisfaction.
Part of the Global Advocate Management team, ensuring that functions are aligned with the company's strategy.
Member of the Atlassian Foundation, fundraising and supporting Room to Read and other local charities investing in education for children.
profile_positions.title: Customer Advocate Manager EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 17 advocates and two supervisors who supported our customers with disabilities that require accommodations to schedule and take their professional assessment and certification.
Established and implemented procedures to maintain the inventory of the latest assistive technology required to support our customers.
Coordinated the relationship and contractual updates with our vendors that provided assistive personnel to our customers.
Established and maintained tracking tools on the team’s Service Level Agreements that was used to report performance and financial updates to internal stakeholders as well as the Senior Management team.
Created innovative procedures in providing accommodations to our customers that resulted in savings of $150,000 on a yearly basis to the company.
Managed all online documents related to Testing Accommodations accessible to our customers by coordinating with the marketing department to ensure we keep the look and feel of the company.
Coordinated with technology to ensure all equipment used on site by customers are compatible with our system upgrades.
Established and implemented an escalating and tracking procedure used to mitigate risks of impact to the customer when equipment is required to be on site.
profile_positions.title: Global Operations Manager - Testing Accommodations

profile_positions.description:
Established policies and procedures to streamline processes for a newly established centralized team that saved the company $200,000 on a yearly basis.
Managed tracking of all transactions completed and cost saving improvements accomplished through eliminating transactions and reducing average handled time.
Established means to communicate to the stakeholders to maintain a consistent and positive relationship.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Global Site Operations

profile_positions.description:
Created and coordinated onboarding processes and procedures for new testing centers and existing ones to improve site availability and increase productivity.
Manage day to day activities for onboarding sites, including contract filing and setting up the testing centers in our operational systems.
Provide training and assistance to other regional departments to adapt the processes and manage the applications accordingly to optimize operational support.
profile_positions.title: Senior Site Readiness Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Coordinated Site Readiness activities with Level 1 and Level 2 Helpdesk teams to establish escalation procedures to improve customer support by reducing average handled time.
Provided accurate and comprehensive documentation to our customers by tracking troubleshooting resolutions.
Coordinated with team leads to track and report out to stakeholders on customer service requests handled via email/phone to achieve service level agreements.
Coached and guided Site Readiness staff to improve personal performance and productivity within the team.
Coordinated the adoption of processes and procedures with regional offices to streamline processes across the board.
profile_positions.title: Site Readiness Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Coordinated with the Spanish sales office to plan and submit customer orders.
Worked with logistics to ensure we meet ETA when placing orders to the manufacturer.
Performed availability checks on materials and determine delivery times.
Controlled the response time on inquiries sent to the suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Account Representative - Spanish Support

profile_positions.description: First line support for operation issues in EMEA.  Coordinated end to end process from contract creation to full operational readiness.
profile_positions.title: Operational Channel Representative
